metadata.title: CVE-2016-5303 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Horde Text Filter API inHorde Groupware and Horde Groupware Webmail Edition before 5.2.16 allowsremote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via crafteddata:text/html content in a form (1) action or (2) xlink attribute.

criterions.comment: php-horde-text-filter package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
